name: 🅱️OOM 2022
description:
This is a 🅱️ad game on purpose., made for a 🅱️ad game jam. Took around 24h to make.

it plays just like DOOM, but everything is random. HTML5 is very bad so just download the windows version plz.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Space🅱️ar: shoot
  • R: Restart level (very important to reset bad RNG)

Features:

  • Infinite random levels
  • Random enemy HP
  • Random enemy damage
  • Random player HP
  • Random player DPS
  • Random player speed
  • Random player turning speed
  • Music kinda does whatever it wants?

ok

🅱️ 🅱️
